Description:
This hero of the Marvel Universe is not like the other characters. It is generally no one else is like! He hears a voice, he said to the players, he loves Mexican food and clockwork girls in bikinis. He is able to save the world like no other, making it pathetic thing in solid joke. Someone said that it crazy, but his army of fans argues differently. He - Deadpool. He can be everything!
Deadpool first time in history became the hero of action, and he really wants to outshine colleagues. Instead of harsh gotemskogo massacre in the style of The Dark Knight - katana hefty guns, explosives and bright, efferent visual brain. Instead quarrelsome fury of Wolverine - mouthwatering terry Yumorok. Instead of dull assistants - the invited guests of the popular comic books, chosen by their looks ... or rather, in her absence. Deadpool knows that you do not have enough in games superhero. And he delivers.
